title: 5.1 Firewall
body:
Patcher works. Client works. Game will not launch. "Check your firewall" yada yada...
I have now repaired and thereafter re installed the game and followed every step on the support page to no avail.
Rito please. WTH?
I even submitted my riot-lol-results-pc file to toxichawk (never responded).
I may not be a very good player but I have invested money in to this game as have countless others and now I can't even launch a Custom Game.
Please address.

replies.body:
Purchased and loaded windows 8.1 last night. Tested my connection in a Custom Game, worked perfectly. Launched a ranked game right now and the problem is back. Have done all support stuff and still. Thanks Rito for another Low Priority Queue in T- 20.

-_-'

>I have invested money

You make it sound like a prestigious bank, not a free-to-play video-game.

Anyway, have you actually checked your firewall? Could be something as simple as a version number incompatibility.

I fixed this problem for my Oceania server by updating my ethernet drivers and using this: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/299357 

But this solution still does not solve my NA account problem.

My OCEANIA WORKS BUT NA STILL DONT:(
got the same problem here buddy, its pretty %%%%ed up
